lines.text: What if... the fire wasn't supposed to burn something in this room?
Huh? What, you think he wanted to burn the whole place down?
Not necessarily the whole place- it's mostly stone construction, so I doubt that'd work anyway.
But with <c=#FF0000>Portable Hole,</c> they could open a hole to one of the adjacent rooms, and burn something in there!
Maybe they owned that room, too, and had some evidence in there they wanted to destroy.
Pulaski, you check out the rest of the floor yet?
...Are you kiddin' me?! Who'd even do that?!
Radioed my guy checkin' out the neighbors.
Seems the room to the left's vacant- nothin' in there.
And on the right... no one's in right now, but landlord says it's an indoor apiary hobbyist.
Meanin' if settin' the next room on fire was the plan, the plan was to infuriate a swarm of stingin' insects.
...Right, which would never ever ever ever ever be anyone's plan, ever. So never mind.
